summary.para: Creates an enumerator of ID lists from the contents of the view.

param.name: pidlFolder
param.para: A PIDL that is relative to the Desktop.

param.name: dwEnumFlags
param.para: Specifies enumeration flags. See the enumerated type.

param.name: ppEnumIDList
param.para: When this method returns, contains an interface pointer.

returns.para: Returns a success value if successful, or an error value otherwise.

summary.para: Sets a callback on the view that is notified when the initial view enumeration is complete.

returns.para: Returns a success value if successful, or an error value otherwise.

summary.para: Exposes methods that enumerate the contents of a view and receive notification from callback upon enumeration completion. This interface enables clients of a view to attempt to share the view's list of folder contents.

remarks.para: (a folder view) supports presentation of the contents of a folder, and exposes the IEnumerableView through QueryService on service request SID_EnumerableView. IEnumerableView offers enhanced performance compared to obtaining the contents of the folder directly from the folder using (call to return this interface). Since the view asked for the contents of the folder in order to display those contents, using IEnumerableView enables a client to get a copy of the work already done by IFolderView.

Typically, this enumeration service is compatible with most folders, and is only provided if it is safe to enumerate the contents of the view. For example, using this service with a folder containing search results is not supported.
